Fix available/away state (fix #637)

Away presence is maintained between active/inactive cycles caused
by internal code and not by UI code.
Away presence is also used as initial presence if the message center
is not held by any component.

This makes possible to store an outgoing image permanently.
However, images get duplicated of course. We'll need to implement
some autodelete feature that also deletes media along with message.
